name: dim
description: Dim is an open-source personal media manager designed to organize local media files and tag them with metadata. It includes a responsive web UI and indexing support, tailored for use alongside tools like Jellyfin.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Tag and categorize local media files. Structured library management

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Browse your collection on any device. Access media anywhere

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Works alongside popular media servers. Enhanced media experience

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Quick scanning of large media libraries. Efficient processing

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your media metadata private. Your collection, your control
